metadata.title: Code Site Art

reasonOne.title: With us — simple, effective, without briefs and technical specifications
reasonOne.description: We promise not to torture you with filling out giant briefs and creating technical specifications. After a 15-minute conference, we will find and present you with the best solution for your business and justify it.

reasonTwo.title: fast and transparent
reasonTwo.description: We work under a contract, fix deadlines. We deliver results on promised deadlines. Payment possible to FOP, crypto, Paypal - as convenient!

reasonThree.title: Guarantee
reasonThree.description: We don't deliver raw products. All our websites go through QA testing before launch. We provide a 1-year product warranty. We support existing projects and promptly make any changes without managers and bureaucracy.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.descriptionFour: We are always in touch and will respond as quickly as possible.

questionOne.title: How much does website creation cost?
questionOne.answer: The development cost depends on your business goals, structure complexity and required functionality. A single-page landing page is suitable for testing hypotheses or quick product presentation and will cost from $1000. If your business needs a full corporate website with sections and internal pages — the price starts from $3000. For online stores and e-commerce solutions with cart, online payment and integrations — from $5000. We develop each project individually so that the website not only looks modern, but actually delivers results.

questionTwo.title: How long does development take?
questionTwo.answer: Development time depends on project complexity. A single-page landing page usually takes 7-14 days. A multi-page corporate website — from 2 to 4 weeks. E-commerce solution with integrations — from 4 to 8 weeks. We always meet promised deadlines and inform about progress at each stage.

questionThree.title: Do you work under a contract and with prepayment?
questionThree.answer: Yes, we work under an official contract that fixes all cooperation terms, deadlines and cost. Prepayment usually amounts to 50% of the total project cost. The remainder is paid after work completion and project acceptance. Payment possible to FOP, cryptocurrency, Paypal — as convenient for you.

questionFour.title: What is included in website development?
questionFour.answer: Development includes: analysis of your niche and competitors, website structure creation, design of all pages, layout and programming, integration of necessary services, SEO optimization, testing and launch. We also provide training materials for working with the website and a 1-year warranty.

questionFive.title: Can I make changes to the website independently?
questionFive.answer: Yes, after launch we provide you with access to the content management system (if provided by the project) or train you to work with the website. You can also always contact us to make changes — we will help promptly without bureaucracy.

questionSix.title: Do you support websites after launch?
questionSix.answer: Yes, we provide a 1-year product warranty and support all our projects after launch. This includes bug fixes, technical support, consultations and prompt changes upon your request.

offerPage.title: Offer
offerPage.content:
This offer is a public offer by FOP Alpatov Fedir Mykhailovych (hereinafter - "Contractor") to conclude a contract for the provision of web development services under the conditions specified below.

1. General Provisions
1.1. This offer regulates the terms of provision of web development services.
1.2. Acceptance of this offer is payment for services or signing a contract.

2. Subject of the Contract
2.1. The Contractor undertakes to provide web development services in accordance with the technical specification.
2.2. The Customer undertakes to accept and pay for the services.

3. Cost and Payment Procedure
3.1. The cost of services is determined individually for each project.
3.2. Payment is made according to the terms of the contract.

4. Rights and Obligations of the Parties
4.1. The Contractor undertakes to perform work within the agreed timeframes.
4.2. The Customer undertakes to provide necessary information and materials.

5. Liability of the Parties
5.1. The parties are liable for non-performance of obligations in accordance with the current legislation of Ukraine.

2.2. The Customer accepts and pays for the services provided.

3. Terms of Performance
3.1. Work is performed in accordance with the technical specification.
3.2. Terms of performance are agreed individually.

4. Payment
4.1. The cost of services is determined separately for each project.
4.2. Payment is made according to the payment schedule.

5. Guarantees
5.1. The Contractor provides a warranty on the developed product for 1 year.
5.2. The warranty includes correction of technical errors and technical support.

policyPage.title: Privacy Policy
policyPage.content:
Privacy Policy Code-site.art

1. General Provisions
1.1. This Privacy Policy defines the procedure for processing personal data of users of the code-site.art website.
1.2. The site administration undertakes to comply with the requirements of the current legislation of Ukraine regarding the protection of personal data.

2. Collection of Personal Data
2.1. We collect only those personal data that are necessary for the provision of services.
2.2. Personal data is collected when filling out forms on the site.

3. Use of Personal Data
3.1. Personal data is used exclusively for:
- communication with clients;
- provision of services;
- sending important messages.

4. Protection of Personal Data
4.1. We take measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access.
4.2. Personal data is not transferred to third parties without the user's consent.

5. User Rights
5.1. The user has the right to access their personal data.
5.2. The user has the right to demand deletion of their personal data.

6. Contact Information
6.1. For questions related to the processing of personal data, contact us using the contacts specified on the site.
